name: Verify that the BBC  Music tracks application can be accessed by users
id: verify-of-get-call-on-media-endpoint:Verify that the BBC  Music tracks application can be accessed by users

testSteps.description: When User sends a GET request to the media endpoints

restQuery.responseHeaders:
Server: nginx/1.18.0 (Ubuntu)
Content-Type: application/json
Transfer-Encoding: chunked
Connection: keep-alive
Cache-Control: no-cache, private
Date: Fri, 21 May
Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET,POST,DELETE,OPTIONS
X-RateLimit-Limit: 60
X-RateLimit-Remaining: 59

testSteps.description: Then then user must get back response with status code 200
